comment_body: This is a really good one
Ok this is a great storyy

This one reminds me of that WKUK sketch where Trevor goes to the doctor because he can't get his mouth closed. The doctor doesn't believe him because he has to close his mouth to talk to him, but he finally decides to have a look.  

As soon as the doctor puts his finger in his mouth, Trevor bites it off, then says, "stop sleeping with my wife!"
